statements: UPDATE wildlife_migration SET animal_name = 'Elephant', migration_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildlife_migration SET gps_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)', 4326) WHERE animal_name = 'Zebra';
UPDATE wildlife_migration SET gps_coordinates = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(-122.3583, 47.6866), 4326) WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildlife_migration SET migration_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE animal_name = 'Elephant' AND gps_coordinates IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE migration_routes SET route_distance = 150 WHERE route_id = 1
UPDATE habitats SET geographic_coordinates = '40.7128° N, 74.0060° W' WHERE habitat_id = 3
UPDATE migration_routes SET route_distance = 120.5, start_location = 'Jungle' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE habitats SET geographic_coordinates = '40.7128° N, 74.0060° W', habitat_type = 'Forest' WHERE habitat_id = 3;
UPDATE wildlife_migration_routes SET start_location='Forest' WHERE route_name = 'Deer Migration';
UPDATE wildlife_habitats SET habitat_type='Savanna' WHERE habitat_location = 'Africa';
UPDATE wildlife_migration_routes SET migration_date = '2022-08-15', end_location = 'New Habitat' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE gps_data SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060, timestamp = '2022-08-10 09:30:00' WHERE data_id = 100;
UPDATE migration_data SET animal_name='Tiger', gps_latitude=37.7749 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE animal_species SET habitat_id=2, migration_status=true WHERE species_name='Lion';
UPDATE migration_data SET gps_latitude = 40.7425, migration_date = '2023-08-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE animal_species SET migration_status = FALSE, habitat_id = 3 WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE migration_routes SET population_size = 500 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE animals SET weight = 25.5, height = 1.2 WHERE animal_id = 3;
UPDATE migration_routes SET population_size = 1000, migration_end = '2023-12-31' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE tracked_animals SET location_data = {lat: 40.7128, lng: -74.0060}, tracking_type = 'GPS' WHERE tracking_id = 5;
